## Introduction

This year also, Apple and Samsung have dominated the top positions in the **Best Mobile Phone** contests worldwide.
However, we cannot ignore the rise of brands like Google Pixel, OnePlus, Huawei too. Therefore, we categorized them 
all by their prices and mentioned the main features, letting you choose the **best fit for your life style (and current budget)**.

## Top Competitors for the 'Best Smart Phone Title'
### ðŸ’¸ For those who buy the latest and greatest ðŸ’¸

As we mentioned, the best mobile phone choice for any individual will highly depend on 
his or her personal expectations and the day-to-day life style. 
For this year's best smart phone title,
we short-listed 4 finalist phones under the most significant criteria that 
everyone would love to have,
 for instance, great camera, long-lasting battery life, fantastic display, and
 reliable OS. It is highly unlikely that one can go wrong with 
 any of these 4 phones, so if your budget allows, 
 we highly recommend you to go with one of these 4 phones.

## Summary

### Best Camera Phone - Huawei P30 Pro

### Best iPhone (Midtier) - Apple iPhone 11

### Best iPhone (Premium) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max

### Best Android (Midtier) - OnePlus 7 Pro

### Best Android (Premium) - Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Plus

### Honorable Mentions #1 (Samsung) - Samsung Galaxy S10E, S10

### Honorable Mentions #2 (Google) - Google Pixel 4 XL, 3A, 3 XL
